name: The Banana Saved The World
description:
Help Jimmy save his grandpa and all the fruits kidnapped by the evil Papar'Ticho in this colorful platform game.

In this game you play as Jimmy who goes on an adventure to save the fruits world. You will have to go through the levels in order to meet the evil Papar'Ticho and force him to free the imprisoned fruits. The path will not be easy because his minions will be in your path as well as many traps.
